column5: 1 bedroom apt. located in downtown Dallas, near Baylor Medical Center & the Arts District. Whether you're a music aficionado, a lover of modern art, or simply enjoy walking along the trails of Exall Park, this location keeps you connected to the activities you find most fulfilling. Getting around Dallas has never been easier, or more convenient. Close to all major highways. There are also several DART stops nearby or a $5 uber/lyft ride to deep ellum/downtown/uptown.
